titles.title: Rolla Airport Improvement Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions imposed in connection with the conveyance of certain lands to the city of Rolla, Missouri.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12736)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 9/29/1993--Introduced. Rolla Airport Improvement Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to grant releases from any terms, conditions, reservations, and restrictions contained in a certain deed conveying certain property to the city of Rolla, Missouri, for airport purposes.
